title: Payments as an Integration Problem
description:
Can we integrate many aspects of payments into a unified model across all of Ethereum? Should we?

We'll look at payment considerations such as
- Freedom & decentralization.
- Multiple chains, tokens, currencies, wallets, and VMs.
- Dividing customer segments and use cases into parts that are clearly similar and parts that are clearly different.
- Payment methods such as sends, bridges, swaps, onramps, unsecured credit, and defi positions.

Enjoy a glimpse into payments futurism!
